summary: This module provides asynchronous utilities for managing Prefect concurrency limits and rate‑limiting. It communicates with the Prefect API to acquire and release concurrency slots, translates API responses into internal representations, and offers helper context managers to enforce these limits during async execution.
business_intent: Allow Prefect workflows to respect configured concurrency caps and rate‑limit policies, preventing resource over‑allocation and handling slot acquisition failures gracefully.
